name: Community Environment Day at Evergreen Brick Works

address.streetAddress: Centre for Green Cities, 550 Bayview Ave

description:
Join Councillor Saxe (Ward 11) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each â€“ cash, debit and credit accepted).

name: Picnics and Pastimes Exhibition
description:
What makes for a delightful picnic? Food and drink? Poetry? Music? 

Immerse yourself into the pleasures, pastimes, and artistic heritage of Iran during the Safavid dynasty (1501-1736). A royal picnic, depicted on a large, treasured tile arch from the collections, is complemented by exceptional objects from the period.

name: Robert Lee
description:
Robert Lee is a Toronto-based upright bassist, composer, and bandleader whose work blends contemporary jazz with Korean traditional music and storytelling. 

A graduate of Berklee Valencia, Lee leads The Robert Lee Group, a project that fuses jazz improvisation with Korean folk elements, earning him recognition as a 2025 Toronto Arts Foundation finalist for "Breakthrough Jazz Artist" and a contributor to the 2024 Juno-nominated album Little Bit a' Love by Denielle Bassels.
